thread.title: Google Drive went down for two hours, chaos ensued
thread.title_full: Google Drive went down for two hours, chaos ensued - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Google Drive went down for two hours, chaos ensued
text: UPDATE 2 p.m.: Google Drive is back. After leaving users panicked and locked out of their own files for about two hours, Google Drive began functioning again around 2 p.m. Friday — just in time for everyone on the east coast to give up and go home for the weekend. At its peak, technology monitoring site Down Detector reported nearly 12,000 »
